meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a five-membered ring with one oxygen and one nitrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study oxazoles to learn about different types of compounds.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often work with oxazoles in their research.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat accidentally spilled a jar of oxazoles, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex web of thoughts, much like the structure of oxazoles.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of oxazoles under the microscope fascinated the students.
